title: Security check failure or stack buffer overrun (crash)

activities.message: Hi @k00r, thanks for your submission. Your report is being reviewed and you'll hear back as soon as there's more to share.
activities.markdown_message: Hi @k00r, thanks for your submission. Your report is being reviewed and you'll hear back as soon as there's more to share.

activities.message:
Hello @k00r,

Your time and effort in submitting this report are much appreciated, however, it seems that the PoC you provided doesn't seem to cause a real security impact on the victim's side and it would require him to manually copy and paste those strings into the appropriate fields.

However, I am now going to contact the internal Notepad team in order to check whether they are interested in fixing this bug regardless.

Your patience is much appreciated.

Regards,
@nasr0x01

Hi @k00r

Can you trace this back to the source code somehow? It would be very helpful if you could indicate the point in the source code where this is happening. This also allows us to assess the impact of this issue more clearly. As indicated in the policy: There is a 20% bonus for including a fix in the report, when accepted by the maintainers.

@lasagna

activities.message:
Hi @lasagna

The exception of overflow occurs in the (notepad++.exe!CommentStyleDialog::setKeywords2List(int id))

In source code this exception locate in UserDefineDialog.cpp(string 522)


Code near exception:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


for (auto i = 0; i < sizeof(list)/sizeof(int); ++i)
        {
            generic_itoa(i, intBuffer+1, 10);
            ::GetDlgItemText(_hSelf, list[i], buffer, max_char);  <========== Overflow
            convertTo(newList, buffer, intBuffer);
        }

        lstrcpy(_pUserLang->_keywordLists[index], newList);
    }
}


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Call stack:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

notepad++.exe!__report_gsfailure(unsigned _int64 stack_cookie) string 199

notepad++.exe!__GSHandlerCheckCommon(void * EstablisherFrame, _DISPATCHER_CONTEXT * DispatcherContex, _GS_HANDLER_DATA * GSHandlerData)

notepad++.exe!__GSHandlerCheck(_EXCEPTION_RECORD * ExceptionRecord, void * EstablisherFrame, _CONTEXT * ContextRecord, _DISPATCHERCONTEXT * DispatcherContext)

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20bced3d()

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20b36c86()

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20bcdc6e()

notepad++.exe!CommentStyleDialog::setKeywords2List(int id) string 522

external code

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------





Possible patch:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For each field, you must enter a limit on the number of accepted characters. For example, in the code, the maximum size of the line for input = ("const int max_char = 1024*30;" (UserDefineLangReference.cpp string 36)), it means that the length of all the entered lines in the fields should not exceed ("const int max_char = 1024*30;" (UserDefineLangReference.cpp string 36)) in total.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @lasagna

The exception of overflow occurs in the (notepad++.exe!CommentStyleDialog::setKeywords2List(int id))

In source code this exception locate in UserDefineDialog.cpp(string 522)

Code near exception:

for (auto i = 0; i < sizeof(list)/sizeof(int); ++i)
{
generic_itoa(i, intBuffer+1, 10);
::GetDlgItemText(_hSelf, list[i], buffer, max_char); <========== Overflow
convertTo(newList, buffer, intBuffer);
}

    lstrcpy(_pUserLang->_keywordLists[index], newList);
}

}

Call stack:

notepad++.exe!__report_gsfailure(unsigned _int64 stack_cookie) string 199

notepad++.exe!__GSHandlerCheckCommon(void * EstablisherFrame, _DISPATCHER_CONTEXT * DispatcherContex, _GS_HANDLER_DATA * GSHandlerData)

notepad++.exe!__GSHandlerCheck(_EXCEPTION_RECORD * ExceptionRecord, void * EstablisherFrame, _CONTEXT * ContextRecord, _DISPATCHERCONTEXT * DispatcherContext)

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20bced3d()

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20b36c86()

ntdll.dll!00007ffc20bcdc6e()

notepad++.exe!CommentStyleDialog::setKeywords2List(int id) string 522

external code

Possible patch:

For each field, you must enter a limit on the number of accepted characters. For example, in the code, the maximum size of the line for input = ("const int max_char = 1024*30;" (UserDefineLangReference.cpp string 36)), it means that the length of all the entered lines in the fields should not exceed ("const int max_char = 1024*30;" (UserDefineLangReference.cpp string 36)) in total.

activities.message:

Regards,
@lasagna

activities.message:
@k00r @lasagna
Why can you provide `1st_field.txt` directly? 
I don't have python and I don't have time to install it - and I don't see especially why I should install python whereas you can provide directly the generated file. 
Thank you for your comprehension.
activities.markdown_message:
@k00r @lasagna
Why can you provide 1st_field.txt directly?
I don't have python and I don't have time to install it - and I don't see especially why I should install python whereas you can provide directly the generated file.
Thank you for your comprehension.

@k00r Thank you.

However, I cannot reproduce crash (see attached screenshot) with the new downloaded minimal package 32 bits.
Am I missing somethings?

@lasagna Did you reproduce it?

activities.message:
Hi @ohnod 


This method works on notepad++ 7.6.2 (https://notepad-plus-plus.org/repository/7.x/7.6.2/npp.7.6.2.Installer.x64.exe) and notepad++ from github ( https://github.com/notepad-plus-plus/notepad-plus-plus/tree/master/PowerEditor;  https://github.com/notepad-plus-plus/notepad-plus-plus/tree/master/scintilla)


If you want triggering this vulnerabiliti in your notepad++ use next steps


1) Use tab "Comment and Number"
2) Open 1st_field.txt and copy content to clipboard
3) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Open"
4) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Continue character"
5) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Close"
6) notepad++ is crash

Perhaps for the 32 bit version you need to use more lines to overflow. Notepad++ 32 bit is also vulnerable
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @ohnod

This method works on notepad++ 7.6.2 (https://notepad-plus-plus.org/repository/7.x/7.6.2/npp.7.6.2.Installer.x64.exe) and notepad++ from github ( https://github.com/notepad-plus-plus/notepad-plus-plus/tree/master/PowerEditor; https://github.com/notepad-plus-plus/notepad-plus-plus/tree/master/scintilla)

If you want triggering this vulnerabiliti in your notepad++ use next steps

1) Use tab "Comment and Number"
2) Open 1st_field.txt and copy content to clipboard
3) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Open"
4) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Continue character"
5) Paste clipboard on "Comment line style in field Close"
6) notepad++ is crash

Perhaps for the 32 bit version you need to use more lines to overflow. Notepad++ 32 bit is also vulnerable

@k00r I did the exact instruction you provide - Cannot reproduce crash even on my linux machine by using WINE.
Do you reproduce it on a VM ?

@lasagna Is it possible that you don't use VM ?

I need to reproduce it to fix it. So it'll help if we can find the difference between my conf & your conf.

activities.message:
@ohnod 

For reproduce this issue i use pc windows 10 x64, notepad++ 7.6.2 x64. Without any vm.  wine on linux is out-of-scope.

activities.message:
Hello @k00r 

Thank you for this report. The team have confirmed your vulnerability as a Low severity impact.

The H1 platform doesn't allow URO payments, hence the funky $285.34 amount.

The USD$ conversion for today is 1 United States Dollar equals 0.88 Euro.

Thanks for your help and participating in this program.

Kind Regards
HackerOne
activities.markdown_message:

The USD$ conversion for today is 1 United States Dollar equals 0.88 Euro.

Thanks for your help and participating in this program.
